Package org.apache.james.postage.jmx

Class Summary
JVMResourceSampler wraps JVMResourceSamplerWorker to allow J2SE 1.4 compatibility
does not access this class through direct reference, only through reflection
in the case this compatibility is removed, simply inline the Worker class
JVMResourceSamplerWorker the peek into the James JVM is done using the build-in management (JMX) of J2SE 5 (and probably later) you must start James under a J2SE 5 compatible JVM and add some system properties to the phoenix.
